abstract.text: Gets the tracking state of the device anchor.
Get disjoint mesh geometries of a given surface classification.
The kinds of alignment — horizontal or vertical — that a plane anchor can have.
Integrate hardware sensing features to produce augmented reality apps and games.
Set the function for receiving barcode detection updates.
Integrate ARKit with low-level libraries and functionality.
An enumeration that describes object tracking errors.
An enumeration that describes the kinds of barcode the framework can detect.
